translation.en: When I was a kid, I was shy,
translation.it: Da ragazzo, ero timido

translation.en: and bodybuilding
translation.it: e il bodybuilding

translation.en: was a sport where you had to perform.
translation.it: era uno sport in cui bisognava esibirsi.

translation.en: So I could learn it in my own way,
translation.it: E io imparai a modo mio

translation.en: to perform and to pose on stage.
translation.it: a esibirmi e a posare sul palco.

translation.en: And people then correct you and say, you know, "Smile more when you perform," and do this and do that.
translation.it: Poi c'era gente che ti correggeva: "Sorridi di più, fai questo eccetera".

translation.en: This is how it slowly came about
translation.it: E fu così che riuscii lentamente

translation.en: to become an entertainer and really enjoying the moment.
translation.it: a diventare un intrattenitore e a godermi quei momenti.

translation.en: In 1968, I went and competed at the Mr. Universe contest in London.
translation.it: Nel 1968, partecipai al concorso di Mr. Universo a Londra.

translation.en: Every time they called out a pose…
translation.it: Ogni volta che chiamavano una posa,

translation.en: If I did a double bicep pose, I had the biggest biceps.
translation.it: quella del doppio bicipite per esempio, io avevo i bicipiti più grossi.

translation.en: Then, when we turned around and do a back pose,
translation.it: Poi, ci giravamo per far vedere la schiena

translation.en: there's no one that's going to have this kind of a back.
translation.it: e nessuno ce l'aveva come la mia.

translation.en: So I knew I'm gonna win.
translation.it: Sapevo che avrei vinto.

translation.en: I win the second Mr. Universe title. I feel, like, at an all-time high.
translation.it: 21/09/1968 - MR. UNIVERSO LONDRA, INGHILTERRA - 1° POSTO Vinsi il secondo titolo di Mr. Universo e mi sentii in cima al mondo.

translation.en: And I'm about to go back to Munich,
translation.it: Stavo per tornare a Monaco,

translation.en: when I get a telegram
translation.it: quando ricetti un telegramma

translation.en: from Joe Weider.
translation.it: da Joe Weider.

translation.en: I said to myself, "Oh my God."
translation.it: ICONA DEL FITNESS Mi dissi: "Oh, mio Dio. Joe Weider? È il guru del bodybuilding".

translation.en: "Joe Weider? He's like the godfather of bodybuilding."
translation.it: Mi dissi: "Oh, mio Dio. Joe Weider? È il guru del bodybuilding".

translation.en: The trainer of champions since 1939.
translation.it: L'allenatore dei campioni dal 1939.

translation.en: All of the guys that win Mr. Universe and Mr. World, they have been trained by Joe Weider.
translation.it: Allenava tutti quelli che vincevano Mr. Universo e Mr. Mondo.

translation.en: And it says in the telegram,
translation.it: Il telegramma diceva:

translation.en: "I'm inviting you to come to Miami to our Mr. Universe competition,"
translation.it: "Ti invito a Miami per partecipare al nostro Mr. Universo",

translation.en: because there was two.
translation.it: perché ce n'erano due.

translation.en: Weider started a Mr. Universe in the 60s in America.
translation.it: Weider aveva fondato il suo negli anni '60 in America.

translation.en: I didn't go back home. I didn't pick up any of my belongings.
translation.it: Così non tornai a casa e non passai a prendere le mie cose.

translation.en: I called Albert and I called Franco and said, "Look."
translation.it: Chiamai Albert e Franco e gli dissi: "Ascoltate.

translation.en: "I just got an invitation from Weider. I'm not coming back."
translation.it: Ho appena ricevuto un invito da Weider. Non torno lì.

translation.en: "I'm gonna move to America."
translation.it: Mi trasferisco in America.

translation.en: "Bye-bye."
translation.it: Ciao".

translation.en: ♪ I got the feelin' ♪
translation.it: AEROPORTO KENNEDY

translation.en: When I came to America, I felt like…
translation.it: Quando arrivai in America, pensai…

translation.en: …finally, I'm in my home.
translation.it: "Finalmente sono a casa".

translation.en: Then we got flew down to Florida.
translation.it: Ci portarono in Florida.

translation.en: [Arnold] I was absolutely convinced that I'm gonna beat all the American bodybuilders.
translation.it: Ero pienamente convinto che avrei battuto tutti i bodybuilder americani.

translation.en: Set me up as kind of, like, the new champion.
translation.it: Mi vedevo già come il nuovo campione

translation.en: Become the greatest bodybuilder of all times.
translation.it: e come il più grande bodybuilder di sempre.

translation.en: He was acting so arrogant and cocky like the winner, but he wasn't in shape,
translation.it: Si comportava in modo arrogante come fosse il vincitore, ma non era in forma.

translation.en: because it was all about being big and, you know, size with him.
translation.it: Per lui contava solo essere grosso.

translation.en: [Arnold] And when they announced the fourth place, third place,
translation.it: Annunciarono il quarto posto, poi il terzo

translation.en: and the second place, Arnold Schwarzenegger.
translation.it: e al secondo: Arnold Schwarzenegger.

translation.en: Oh, fuck.
translation.it: "Oh, cazzo.

translation.en: This can't be.
translation.it: Non può essere."

translation.en: I once was considered the unbeatable guy, and now, all of a sudden, Frank Zane won.
translation.it: Un attimo prima ero considerato imbattibile e quello dopo Frank Zane mi aveva battuto.

translation.en: This is terrible. I'm embarrassed.
translation.it: Fu terribile. Ero imbarazzato.

translation.en: [Frank] I think he was just used to winning all the time.
translation.it: Era abituato a vincere sempre.

translation.en: Landing in this country the first time, getting defeated
translation.it: Atterrare in questo Paese la prima volta e venire sconfitto

translation.en: by, as his words,
translation.it: da, citando le sue parole,

translation.en: "a chicken with 17-inch arms,"
translation.it: "un pollo con le braccia di 45 cm"

translation.en: that really bothered him.
translation.it: gli diede parecchio fastidio.

translation.en: [Arnold] I was so devastated.
translation.it: Ero devastato.

translation.en: I was lying there in the middle of the night in bed
translation.it: Ero sdraiato a letto

translation.en: in this hotel room,
translation.it: nella mia camera d'hotel

translation.en: and I thought the world is coming to an end.
translation.it: e mi sembrava che il mondo fosse finito.

translation.en: I'm in a strange country.
translation.it: "Sono in un Paese straniero.

translation.en: I cannot communicate here.
translation.it: Non sono in grado di comunicare.

translation.en: I'm thousands of miles away from home.
translation.it: Mi trovo a migliaia di chilometri da casa.

translation.en: And I just lost.
translation.it: E sono stato appena sconfitto.

translation.en: I just disappointed everybody.
translation.it: Ho deluso tutti."

translation.en: So in my mind, the bodybuilding world was going to say,
translation.it: Credevo che, nel mondo del bodybuilding,

translation.en: "Schwarzenegger is not what we thought he is."
translation.it: avrebbero detto: "Schwarzenegger non è quello che pensavamo.

translation.en: "So fuck him."
translation.it: Vada a farsi fottere".

translation.en: I cried the whole night.
translation.it: Piansi tutta la notte.

translation.en: The next day, I said, "Okay." "You cried like a little baby, you asshole."
translation.it: Il giorno dopo, mi dissi: "Ok. Hai pianto come un bambino, coglione.

translation.en: "And now, let's move on."
translation.it: Ora, andiamo avanti".

translation.en: And then Weider gave me an airline ticket to go to Los Angeles.
translation.it: E poi Weider mi diede un biglietto aereo per Los Angeles.

translation.en: He's gonna take care of things and he's gonna get me an apartment.
translation.it: Si sarebbe occupato di tutto, mi avrebbe preso un appartamento.

translation.en: I wrote to my friends right away. I said, "This is quite different."
translation.it: Scrissi subito ai miei amici: "Qui è diverso".

translation.en: I felt, like, totally helpless
translation.it: Mi sentivo completamente inutile

translation.en: and alone.
translation.it: e solo.

translation.en: The gyms that I went to
translation.it: Nelle palestre in cui andai

translation.en: were gyms where the best bodybuilders worked out.
translation.it: si allenavano i migliori bodybuilder.

translation.en: I come in there and I want to work out.
translation.it: Entravo lì e volevo allenarmi.

translation.en: And there's guys that owned the gym, like, Vince Gironda, he owned Vince's Gym.
translation.it: Il proprietario di una palestra, Vince Gironda, che possedeva la Vince's,

translation.en: He says, "You're still a baby."
translation.it: mi disse: "Sei ancora un bambino.

translation.en: "We have to get rid of a lot of fat on you,
translation.it: Dobbiamo sbarazzarci di un sacco di grasso,

translation.en: but you have a lot of potential."
translation.it: ma hai molto potenziale".

translation.en: And I said to myself, "What the fuck is he talking about? Potential?"
translation.it: Pensai: "Di che cazzo parla? Potenziale?"

translation.en: Then I trained at Gold's Gym,
translation.it: Poi mi allenai alla Gold's Gym,

translation.en: and Joe Gold immediately called me "Balloon Belly."
translation.it: e Joe Gold mi soprannominò "Pancione".

translation.en: I said,
translation.it: Dissi:

translation.en: "Jesus."
translation.it: "Gesù".

translation.en: I realized why it was so important to come to America,
translation.it: Capii perché fosse così importante trasferirsi in America,

translation.en: because they just have a whole different understanding of what it means being in shape.
translation.it: perché c'è una visione del tutto diversa di cosa significhi essere in forma.

translation.en: I alone cannot accomplish anything.
translation.it: Da solo, non avrei ottenuto nulla.

translation.en: I need help.
translation.it: Mi serviva aiuto.

translation.en: So I invited Frank Zane, the guy that I was beaten by,
translation.it: Così, invitai Frank Zane, il tipo che mi aveva battuto,

translation.en: to come out to California and to train with me,
translation.it: a raggiungermi in California e ad allenarsi con me.

translation.en: because I wanted to see firsthand what does he do to get this kind of a quality of a physique.
translation.it: Volevo vedere da vicino cosa facesse per ottenere quel tipo di fisico.

translation.en: And I stayed with him on a cot in his living room,
translation.it: Mi trasferii da lui. Dormivo su una branda nel salotto.

translation.en: and we'd go to the gym and train.
translation.it: Ci allenavamo insieme in palestra, andavamo in spiaggia.

translation.en: Go to the beach. Take pictures for Weider.
translation.it: Ci allenavamo insieme in palestra, andavamo in spiaggia. Facevamo foto per Weider.

translation.en: I went back to Florida
translation.it: Tornai in Florida, lasciai il posto da insegnante

translation.en: and resigned my teaching position and moved to California.
translation.it: Tornai in Florida, lasciai il posto da insegnante e mi trasferii in California.

translation.en: [Arnold] And then, when I was training here, especially in Gold's Gym, I felt like,
translation.it: Poi, mentre mi allenavo qui, soprattutto alla Gold's Gym, pensai:

translation.en: "Wouldn't it be great if Franco would see what's going on here?"
translation.it: "Non sarebbe bello se Franco vedesse cosa succede qui?"

translation.en: I mean, he was my close friend and training partner in Munich.
translation.it: Era un mio caro amico e compagno di allenamento a Monaco.

translation.en: I really missed him.
translation.it: Mi mancava molto.

translation.en: But when Weider heard what his height was, he had no interest at all.
translation.it: Ma Weider disse di non essere interessato per via della sua altezza.

translation.en: So he kept saying, "No, I don't want to bring over a little guy like that." "Come on."
translation.it: Diceva sempre: "Non porterò qui un piccoletto del genere. Andiamo".

translation.en: And then eventually Artie Zeller, the photographer, and I,
translation.it: Alla fine, io e Artie Zeller, il fotografo,

translation.en: we kind of convinced him.
translation.it: riuscimmo a convincerlo.

translation.en: And from then, I mean, everything really picked up.
translation.it: E, da allora, fu tutto un crescendo.

translation.en: -[groans] -[Arnold] What?
translation.it: Che c'è?

translation.en: -[laughs] -[Arnold] Okay. -That's hard. -[Franco] I get it.
translation.it: - Ok. È difficile. - Ce la faccio.

translation.en: -I get it. -[Arnold] Oh, Franco gets it.
translation.it: - Ce la faccio. - Franco ce la fa.

translation.en: -Okay, pick it up. -[both laughing]
translation.it: Ok, puoi aiutarmi, ora.

translation.en: [Arnold] In that area of building a community,
translation.it: Nell'ambito della costruzione di una comunità,

translation.en: the talent of mine was actually better
translation.it: avevo anche più talento

translation.en: than my talent in bodybuilding.
translation.it: che nel bodybuilding.

translation.en: [Arnold] Gold's Gym in Venice Beach.
translation.it: Nella Gold's Gym a Venice Beach,

translation.en: Bodybuilders training for championships went there to train.
translation.it: si allenavano i bodybuilder per partecipare ai campionati.

translation.en: [Arnold] And then Joe Weider publicized it as the champions' gym.
translation.it: E Joe Weider la pubblicizzò come la palestra dei campioni.

translation.en: -[man] That nose will look skinny now. -[laughing]
translation.it: Ora quel naso sembrerà piccolo.

translation.en: My first impression of him was he was outgoing, funny,
translation.it: La mia prima impressione di lui fu che era estroverso, divertente

translation.en: and always cracking jokes.
translation.it: e sempre pronto a fare battute.

translation.en: When he was in the gym, he was focused.
translation.it: Ma, quando era in palestra, era concentrato.

translation.en: [Frank] It was all energy, and we helped each other.
translation.it: C'era tanta energia e ci aiutavamo tra noi.

translation.en: Now, Arnold was a great person to have in the gym when you're working out,
translation.it: Era fantastico avere Arnold in palestra,

translation.en: because just his presence made you want to work out harder just to impress him.
translation.it: perché ci sentivamo spinti a fare di più per far colpo su di lui.

translation.en: He was a perfectionist.
translation.it: Era un perfezionista.

translation.en: [Arnold] You train together, help each other. You even help each other pumping up backstage with the towels,
translation.it: Ci allenavamo insieme, ci aiutavamo, pompavamo le braccia con gli asciugamani,

translation.en: and you oil each other up.
translation.it: ci spalmavamo l'olio.

translation.en: You put the oil on me because I cannot reach in the back. Someone has to put the oil on my back.
translation.it: Non puoi metterlo da solo sulla schiena, ti serve qualcuno che lo faccia.

translation.en: That's what you do. You help each other.
translation.it: Funzionava così. Ci aiutavamo.

translation.en: And then before you go out, you say, "Good luck."
translation.it: E prima della gara, ci auguravamo buona fortuna.

translation.en: I used to say, "Good luck," and "I'm going to beat you."
translation.it: Io dicevo: "Buona fortuna. Ti batterò".

translation.en: [Arnold] I was never a fanatic about diet.
translation.it: Non ero mai stato un fanatico della dieta.

translation.en: It was Frank Zane and Franco Columbu who put my vitamins together.
translation.it: Erano Frank Zane e Franco Columbu a dirmi quali vitamine prendere.

translation.en: And then we would experiment with steroids.
translation.it: Poi iniziammo a sperimentare con l'uso di steroidi.

translation.en: Everybody in the bodybuilding field who is up there on the top
translation.it: Tutti i bodybuilder più affermati

translation.en: is taking steroids.
translation.it: prendono steroidi.

translation.en: Maybe five percent of my progress is from the steroids.
translation.it: A mio avviso, hanno contribuito a circa il 5% dei miei progressi.

translation.en: I had doctor's supervision.
translation.it: Ero seguito da un medico.

translation.en: You stayed with a very strict rule of doing it four months a year
translation.it: Mi attenevo a delle regole severe, prendendoli per quattro mesi l'anno

translation.en: before a competition, and then lay off.
translation.it: prima delle gare e poi smettendo.

translation.en: So I changed my eating habits and everything.
translation.it: Cambiai anche le mie abitudini alimentari.

translation.en: I got really tanned.
translation.it: Mi abbronzai tantissimo.

translation.en: If your whole personality is to show off,
translation.it: Se hai una personalità esibizionista,

translation.en: you can't wait to show people what you have.
translation.it: non vedi l'ora di metterti in mostra.

translation.en: There were hundreds of people watching guys work out.
translation.it: E ci guardavano in centinaia mentre ci allenavamo.

translation.en: [Arnold] I felt like I was living in the middle of a circus.
translation.it: Mi sembrava di vivere in un circo.

translation.en: So you were getting it all times,
translation.it: Quindi, una cosa che non mancava mai

translation.en: the satisfaction of people watching you
translation.it: era la soddisfazione di essere osservati

translation.en: and saying, "Wow, he looks incredible."
translation.it: e ammirati dalla gente.

translation.en: [woman] It was the summer of '69.
translation.it: Era l'estate del '69.

translation.en: I was working as a hostess at Zucky's Deli.
translation.it: Facevo la cameriera da Zucky's Deli.

translation.en: He came over to me and he said,
translation.it: Venne da me e mi disse:

translation.en: "You are so sexy." "I need to ask you out on a date."
translation.it: "Sei davvero sexy. Devo assolutamente chiederti di uscire".

translation.en: With a really thick accent.
translation.it: Con un accento molto marcato.

translation.en: Barely 100 words in his vocabulary.
translation.it: Sapeva dire a malapena 100 parole.

translation.en: He was handsome. He was magnetic. He was charismatic.
translation.it: Era bello. Era magnetico. Era carismatico.

translation.en: He was just different.
translation.it: Era diverso.

translation.en: When he arrived for our date, I was watching the moon landing.
translation.it: Quando arrivò all'appuntamento, stavo guardando lo sbarco sulla luna.

translation.en: [man over radio] We copy it down, Eagle.
translation.it: Ti riceviamo, Aquila.

translation.en: So we watched it together. We took photos in front of the television.
translation.it: Lo guardammo insieme. Facemmo foto davanti alla televisione.

translation.en: [man 2 over radio] Tranquility base here. The eagle has landed.
translation.it: Qui Base della Tranquillità. L'Aquila è atterrata.

translation.en: [Barbara] After our first date, we saw each other all the time that we could.
translation.it: Dopo quel primo appuntamento, ci vedevamo ogni volta che potevamo.

translation.en: He created laughter everywhere.
translation.it: Lui scherzava sempre.

translation.en: He was just so
translation.it: Era davvero…

translation.en: mesmerizing.
translation.it: un tipo affascinante.

translation.en: [Arnold] Barbara was the first time
translation.it: Barbara è stata la prima persona

translation.en: that I saw, through her, kind of how America celebrates Christmas,
translation.it: che mi ha fatto vedere come si festeggia il Natale in America.

translation.en: because she would take me home,
translation.it: Perché mi ha portato a casa sua

translation.en: and the family would just be so inclusive.
translation.it: e la sua famiglia è stata molto accogliente.

translation.en: It was the first time
translation.it: Ed è stato grazie a loro

translation.en: in my life that I ever celebrated a birthday,
translation.it: che ho festeggiato per la prima volta un compleanno,

translation.en: when Barbara's mother made a birthday cake.
translation.it: quando sua madre mi ha fatto una torta.

translation.en: I never got a cake. No one ever sang "Happy Birthday" or anything.
translation.it: Non avevo mai avuto torte o gente che mi cantasse "Buon compleanno".

translation.en: I don't know why.
translation.it: Non so perché.

translation.en: It gave me another way of really appreciating
translation.it: È stata un'altra cosa che mi ha fatto davvero apprezzare

translation.en: the American way of life,
translation.it: lo stile di vita americano

translation.en: and to have a normal life.
translation.it: e il fatto di avere una vita normale.

translation.en: But with my family…
translation.it: Con i miei, invece…

translation.en: The communication with my parents was not good.
translation.it: Tra me e i miei genitori non c'era comunicazione.

translation.en: And my brother… I kind of erased him out of my mind
translation.it: E, riguardo a mio fratello, l'ho eliminato dalla mia mente per anni

translation.en: for years during my bodybuilding years.
translation.it: E, riguardo a mio fratello, l'ho eliminato dalla mia mente per anni durante il mio periodo nel bodybuilding.

translation.en: I felt like I was creating my own life over here,
translation.it: Sentivo di essermi creato una mia vita qui

translation.en: and I wanted nothing to do with my past life.
translation.it: e non volevo avere più nulla a che fare col passato.

translation.en: Joe Weider was interested in trying to figure out how does he sell me.
translation.it: Joe Weider voleva capire come vendere il mio personaggio.

translation.en: So he came up with this idea
translation.it: Così, gli venne l'idea

translation.en: that I'm this German machine.
translation.it: della macchina tedesca.

translation.en: No emotions, just marching forward,
translation.it: Niente emozioni, inarrestabile.

translation.en: and it's going to make me the champion.
translation.it: Un'immagine che mi avrebbe reso campione.

translation.en: And I loved it, because that's what I saw myself,
translation.it: E mi piaceva, perché era così che mi vedevo,

translation.en: as someone that couldn't be stopped.
translation.it: come qualcuno che non si può fermare.

translation.en: Joe Weider had one goal in mind, and that is that I win every competition.
translation.it: Joe Weider aveva un solo obiettivo, cioè di farmi vincere tutte le gare,

translation.en: That I'm on the cover of his magazine.
translation.it: di mettermi sulla copertina della sua rivista,

translation.en: That I sell a shitload of food supplements for him.
translation.it: di farmi vendere una marea di integratori per lui

translation.en: And that everything that I did, he would use the name Weider for it.
translation.it: e di affibbiare il nome Weider a ogni cosa che facevo.

translation.en: So when I came up with
translation.it: Così, quando pensai di dividere

translation.en: splitting my bicep training with my tricep training,
translation.it: l'allenamento dei bicipiti da quello dei tricipiti,

translation.en: he called it The Weider Split Routine.
translation.it: lo chiamò l'Allenamento suddiviso di Weider.

translation.en: So that was the deal.
translation.it: Erano questi i patti.

translation.en: [Weider] I'm just gonna go over this.
translation.it: Voglio parlare di questo.

translation.en: You should have unique pictures taken, Arnold.
translation.it: Dobbiamo farti fare delle foto uniche, Arnold,

translation.en: Make it look different.
translation.it: renderle diverse.

translation.en: I had to go and work with him and say,
translation.it: Dovetti andare da lui e dirgli:

translation.en: "Joe, you're selling your products. You're making millions of dollars."
translation.it: "Stai vendendo i tuoi prodotti e stai guadagnando milioni.

translation.en: "I want to also sell some products of mine."
translation.it: Anch'io voglio vendere dei miei prodotti.

translation.en: "All I need from you is give me advertisement space in your magazine."
translation.it: Mi serve solo uno spazio pubblicitario sulla tua rivista".

translation.en: I wanted to make money and I wanted to turn one dollar into two.
translation.it: Volevo guadagnare. Volevo moltiplicare i miei profitti.

translation.en: And I wanted to learn how to do that in America the American way.
translation.it: E volevo imparare a farlo in America e all'americana.

translation.en: I said to Joe Weider,
translation.it: Dissi a Joe Weider:

translation.en: "Can you help me? I want to go to college to learn English."
translation.it: "Vorrei andare al college a imparare l'inglese.

translation.en: "Then I wanna take some business classes,
translation.it: Seguirò anche corsi d'economia,

translation.en: because eventually I may have to take over your operation."
translation.it: così in futuro potrò rilevare la tua attività".

translation.en: And he loved that.
translation.it: E lui adorò l'idea.

translation.en: These are the new covers.
translation.it: Ecco la nuova copertina.

translation.en: [Arnold] Let me see it.
translation.it: Fammi vedere.

translation.en: We don't want to put him on the cover. Come on, Joe.
translation.it: Non conviene mettere lui in copertina, dai.

translation.en: You told me one time that you're only putting Mr. Universes or Mr. Olympias on the cover. [Joe] Five more copies…
translation.it: Una volta, mi hai detto che avresti messo solo i Mr. Universo o i Mr. Olympia.

translation.en: [Arnold] Joe?
translation.it: Joe?

translation.en: [Arnold] Every time I want anything,
translation.it: Ogni volta che raggiungo un traguardo,

translation.en: I say to myself, "Okay, now what's the next thing?"
translation.it: mi dico: "Ok, qual è il prossimo?"

translation.en: If you're always hungry, you're never really satisfied.
translation.it: Se vuoi sempre di più, non sei mai veramente soddisfatto.

translation.en: Because Reg Park, of course, won three Mr. Universe contests,
translation.it: Poiché Reg Park aveva vinto tre volte Mr. Universo,

translation.en: Arnold has to break that record.
translation.it: Arnold doveva battere quel record.
